name: JetBrains ACP Agent Registry
description: A directory of AI coding agents integrated directly into JetBrains IDEs, allowing users to browse and connect external AI agents without manual setup. Launched in partnership with Zed as the 'LSP protocol for coding agents' enabling open interoperability.
community_quotes: Described as 'a very exquisite, compact protocol' that 'strictly follows MCP's Json-RPC specification'
Called the 'LSP protocol for Coding Agents' highlighting its decoupling and openness

name: Ai2 SERA (Open Coding Agents)
description: A family of open-source AI developer/coding agents designed to help developers work with any codebase. Includes SERA CLI tool for integration with Claude Code. Targets independent developers and SMEs with training cost reductions up to 11x.
community_quotes: Fast and accessible coding agents that adapt to any repository
Designed for independent developers and SMEs
Can reduce typical training costs by up to 11 times

name: Kilo Code Reviewer
description: Automatic AI-powered code reviews that activate when you open a PR. Achieved #1 Product of the Day with 658 upvotes on January 27, 2026.
community_quotes: Provides instant code reviews the moment you open or update a PR
#1 Product of the Day with 658 upvotes

name: Tonkotsu
description: A GUI-based tool that lets developers manage a team of coding agents from a document. Launched on Product Hunt achieving #1 Day Rank with 378 upvotes.
community_quotes: Doc-as-control panel for coding agents feels right
Treats AI like a team, not a trick
Centering on a doc was the most consequential design decision
